Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
